title: Interpretation of my sister’s dream of cleaning my house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my sister cleaning my house in a dream. The vision of relatives varies, so we present below the interpretation of a dream about my sister cleaning my house in a dream and other details that interest you according to the interpretations of scholars..Interpretation of a dream about my sister cleaning my house in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister cleaning my house in a dream can lead to... To the good that she will get from the owner of the house, and God knows best. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees her sister cleaning her house in a dream, this may indicate a project that she can participate in, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees someone cleaning his house in a dream, this may be evidence of a crisis. He goes through it, and a person helps him solve it, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees his sister cleaning his house in a dream, this may represent the good that the sister gets from her brother, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my sister’s miscarriage in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about my sister’s miscarriage in a dream A pregnant woman’s miscarriage may lead to the woman giving birth before her due date, and God knows all the unseen. If the dreamer sees his pregnant sister miscarriage, this may indicate premature birth, and God is Most High. If an unmarried girl sees a miscarriage in a dream, this may be evidence of the loss of anxiety and sadness, God willing. If she sees a divorced woman. Abortion in a dream may be evidence of marriage, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my sister calling me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister praying for me in a dream. If a married woman sees in a dream a man praying for her, it may portend goodness that she will succeed, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees in a dream someone praying for her If a married man sees his sister praying for him in a dream, this may indicate the good that he will achieve, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about my sister going to prison in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister going to prison. Prison in a dream Seeing going to prison can have different meanings between good and bad. Going to prison in a dream can represent a restriction and lack of freedom, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees that she will be imprisoned in a dream, this may mean that she bears responsibility, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself Going to prison, this may be evidence of some self-confidence problems, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my sister defending me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister defending me in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this, except that seeing someone defending me in a dream could be evidence of sincerity and love for the dreamer and God. I know the unseen. Likewise, if a married woman sees in a dream someone defending her, this may indicate his intense love and appreciation for the woman, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees someone she knows defending her, this may lead to love and sincerity in his feelings towards the girl, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my sister studying in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about my sister studying in a dream We did not find specific interpretations to see this. However, seeing a study in a dream can be a sign of goodness and living, and God knows everything that is not seen, such as seeing a woman

title: Interpretation of the color yellow in a dream

preview.html: So the ongoing question is whether yellow will mean the same things in the dream world or whether the interpretation will differ based on other considerations. Interpretation of yellow in a dream Yellow is one of the amazing colors, both in the real world and in the dream world, and because it is one of the colors Happy people in the world, some will be curious to know the interpretation of seeing the color yellow in a dream. As follows: According to what the great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin said about seeing the color yellow in a dream, it indicates the approach of a series of good and happy news to God. But keep in mind that the yellow color itself has many shades, so the meaning of each can differ. A shade of yellow. The interpretation of light yellow differs from the interpretation of yellow light and others. But yellow generally indicates good and happy news. It also indicates the approaching of many good and praiseworthy news for the dreamer, in addition to being considered a harbinger of a decent life full of prosperity. Seeing the color yellow often means that the dreamer will live a decent and enjoyable life and will enjoy remarkable stability in his social life and will be successful. While the appearance of the yellow color can indicate something unpleasant if the yellow color is light. Like the color of the patient’s skin, in this case it should The fortuneteller must take care of his health and take care of his health, and follow the correct advice and instructions. The dreamer who is exposed to seeing the light yellow color in a dream must avoid bad habits of any kind. This is because in the dream it is a sign of the approaching illness, God forbid. The light yellow color also indicates The presence of family quarrels or disagreements in the life of the fortuneteller. See here: Yellow watermelon in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a yellow dress in a dream. There is a special explanation for the color yellow, if it comes in general, and there is another interpretation for it if it relates to clothing, and this matter is unanimously agreed upon by the great interpreters and scholars, and we know what The following is: Interpretation of seeing the color yellow: Seeing the bright yellow color closest to the golden color in a dream, whether it is related to clothes, jewelry, any personal belongings, or even flowers, or the shape of fields, indicates great happiness awaiting the person with the vision, and therefore it is considered a praiseworthy vision. Usually The yellow color in clothes in a dream or a woman’s vision indicates happiness, happiness, and pleasure. While seeing the yellow color in a dream in a man’s dream usually indicates the abundance of sustenance that awaits him. Seeing the light yellow color in a man’s or woman’s dream indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to something Annoying, this vision is considered unpleasant, and God knows best. Seeing the color yellow in Nabulsi was interpreted by dividing clothes according to the type of fabric. For example, yellow silk clothes are considered a sign that the dreamer is an arrogant and arrogant person. Seeing a dead person in a dream wearing yellow silk clothes is considered a vision. Pleasant and praiseworthy. This is because it indicates that the deceased will enjoy the abode of truth, his home in the afterlife. This indicates that he will enjoy...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a picture, the photographer’s vision, and photography

preview.html: The person who takes pictures is called a photographer, and seeing him in a dream also has a meaning, apart from the meaning of seeing the picture, and this is what we explain in our article today. Interpretation of a dream about photography in a dream: Seeing a camera “Camera” in a dream, indicates the emotion of the beholder.” With nostalgia. As for the one who sees The camera is broken, this indicates the viewer’s lack of interest in many things in his personal and professional life. The meaning of seeing a broken camera A dream about breaking a photo machine in a dream indicates hesitation, confusion, and confusion that the viewer is experiencing. A person who dreams that someone else is taking a picture of it indicates that the dreamer keeps his secrets and does not interfere in anyone’s life, But he does not know that someone is following him from afar. Whoever dreams that he is photographing nature, this is a sign of his inner life and a great illusion. As for whoever sees himself photographing others in a dream, this indicates a passionate, one-sided love story. The meaning of seeing pictures in a dream. Whoever sees pictures in a dream means memories. Dreaming of cutting up pictures in a dream shows separation and forgetfulness. Seeing cutting up private pictures in a dream means that the dreamer will get into a big problem that he does not expect. Anyone who sees exchanging pictures with a girl is a sign of love and affection between them without shaking hands. As for someone who dreams of burning family photos in a dream, it is a sign of alienation and age. Later. The meaning of seeing a picture in a dream. A dream of photographing inside. Dark, distant places. In a dream, it shows the calamity that causes the dreamer to enter prison. Perhaps the vision indicates entering dangerous places that the dreamer has not known before. Seeing a picture in a dream is about a person suffering from noise. Crowding is an indication of the calmness in which he lives in the next space. When someone dreams of being photographed in an old place, this indicates memories of the past that haunt the dreamer. Who dreams of taking photographs? An actor or a famous person indicates the beginning of his fame and success as a photographer. A student who dreams of being photographed in natural and beautiful places in a dream is a sign Congratulations on his success, he excelled in his studies. Add the dream you would like to interpret, indicating the marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Find out the interpretation of a dream about marrying someone I know who is married to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that I got married to someone I know and he is married. Marriage in general is a common dream in many dreams and carries hundreds of interpretations and various negative and positive connotations, but what about the interpretation of the dream that I get married to someone I know who is married? In answering this question, we find different interpretations from one viewer to another. They differ in a single dream from a married woman’s dream and others. If you are interested in researching the meaning of this dream, you can continue reading this article. I dreamed that I got married to someone I know and he is married. When interpreting a dream about the wedding of a married person known to the dreamer, scientists provide various evidence, such as: Dream interpreters say that seeing an unmarried dreamer getting married to someone you know In a dream and he is married in reality it can warn her that she is facing difficulties in achieving her goals. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is marrying a familiar and married person, she may soon become attached, but the engagement will not continue. Interpretation of the dream that I married someone I know who is married to a woman Married is different and shows great benefit from it. Some jurists believe that the dream of marrying a married man in the dream of a divorced woman who was a member of her ex-husband’s family is a sign of returning to her ex-husband and ending the dispute between them. I dreamed that I married a person I know who is married to Ibn Sirin, according to Ibn Sirin. Sirin, in explaining the vision of marrying a well-known married man, said the following: Ibn Sirin says that the dream of a dreaming woman married to a married man whom she knows is a sign of the abundance of food and the abundance of living. While it indicates that the widow in her dream marrying a happily married man in his life, it indicates that she is on the wrong path after the death of Her husband, whose sanctity and conduct she does not maintain after his death. He neglects to raise her children. If a pregnant woman sees in the first months that she is marrying one of her relatives and he is married and happy, then she will give birth to a female, because giving birth to a female in a dream is a symbol of comfort, contentment, and happiness. . I dreamed that I married someone I know who is married to single women. The interpretation of a dream about a single woman marrying a married man has positive and negative interpretations, such as: It is said that a dream about an unmarried woman marrying someone she knows is married could mean that she will be exposed to problems and bring anxiety into her life. If the girl If she is engaged and dreams that she is marrying one of her married acquaintances, there may be severe disagreements between her and her fiancé until the end of the engagement. The interpretation of a dream about a single woman marrying a married man may indicate that she has gone through bad events in her life. Whereas if the dreamer sees that she feels happy in marrying a relative Married in his dream, this indicates helping him with something and standing by her. I dreamed that I married someone I know and he is married to a married woman. Scholars’ interpretation differs when a married woman marries a married man she knows. We find that its connotations here are better than a single dream, as follows: A married woman’s dream of marrying someone she knows who is married indicates the goodness that is coming in her life. I dreamed that I married a man who I am married to and he is married to a married woman, which indicates an imminent pregnancy. As for If the dreamer sees that she is marrying a married man whom she knows and hates

title: Interpretation of the birth of a girl in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Giving birth to a girl in an unmarried woman’s dream. Pregnancy and childbirth are among the most beautiful blessings that God - Glory be to Him - gives to His servants, and one of us feels great joy when he is blessed with a woman like the Messenger - may God bless him and grant him peace. He recommended it when he said: “Be gentle with the bottles,” and in the context of this article we will explain the various connotations narrated by jurists in interpreting the vision of a single girl in her dream that she gave birth to a girl, and does the dream carry a praiseworthy interpretation or not?! The birth of a girl in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the most important indications. What scholars have explained in interpreting the dream of an unmarried girl giving birth is as follows: If a girl sees in her dream that she has given birth to a girl, this is an indication that in the coming days a great benefit will be achieved in her life, which will bring joy and comfort to her heart. Also, the dream of a single girl giving birth indicates that A person with an optimistic outlook and characterized by an ambitious personality who loves life and does not give up easily. If an unmarried woman suffers from many obstacles in her life and there is no one to support her and stand by her and she dreams that she is giving birth to a baby girl, then this is a sign of his death, sad and lively. Worry and feel the solutions, happiness, peace of mind and many beautiful surprises. To know Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of other dreams, go to Google and type a site about the secrets of dream interpretation... You will find everything you are looking for. The birth of a girl in a dream of an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin explained - may God have mercy on him. God - The birth of a girl in a dream for unmarried women has many interpretations, the most important of which is what can be clarified through the following: If an unmarried woman dreams that she is giving birth, this is a sign of the end of the difficult period of her life and the end of the worry and anxiety that is overwhelming her chest. The birth of a girl in A dream for an unmarried woman symbolizes that she is unique in her high morals, good upbringing, closeness to God, and her complete confidence that any success she achieves is thanks to Him - Glory be to Him. Cut it off and try again until you get what you want. If the girl is a student of science and has not yet reached the age of marriage and dreams of giving birth to a girl, this is a sign that she has achieved the highest academic ranks and a distinguished position in society. Giving birth to a girl in a dream for a single woman and breastfeeding. Seeing a girl breastfeeding a girl even She stops crying, indicating that a religious and moral young man will propose to her soon. An affliction. The birth of a girl in a dream by an unmarried woman and her breastfeeding her indicates that she is suffering from a physical illness that will not take long to recover from. The meaning of the birth of a girl in a dream for an unmarried womanIf an unmarried woman dreams that she is giving birth to a beautiful girl, this means that there is a desperate dream To achieve it, which is personal or specific to her study, and she will get it soon, and in case. The girl is suffering from some disagreements at the family level or is facing a number of problems outside of it and dreams of giving birth to a beautiful baby girl, which is a sign that she will be able to resolve them within the next few days. The dream of a girl giving birth to an unmarried woman in a dream symbolizes marriage if she wants to marry a specific man.

title: Interpretation of a dream about fear of falling in a dream

preview.html: Falling in a dream is one of the things that the dreamer asks about, what is its interpretation or interpretation, and we will discover in our encyclopedia article its interpretation (fear of falling in a dream) and whether this is good or not. Desirable. Interpretation of a dream about fear of falling in a dream: Descending in a dream, whether it is from a ladder, from a house, or from a high place, then this dream is not good. This dream illustrates the misfortune that will happen to the dreamer, the anxiety, worry, and sadness that will happen to him in the coming days. Also, falling in the dream indicates failure in professional and personal life and that it will have many consequences and problems (and God knows best). Fear of falling indicates: to be afraid The dreamer is concerned about something or that he will go into some trade or business and marry a woman and is afraid of this experience. In this case, the dreamer must ask God, Blessed and Most High, for what is good for him. Interpretation of descending the stairs in a dream: Descending the stairs in a dream indicates that a problem will arise in the dreamer. A big one, and that he will enter into a profession or business and fail in it and suffer great losses, or he will lose someone he loves and is dear to him. (And God knows best). Interpretation of descending from above in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is descending from a high place to a low place, this is evidence that the dreamer will make a major change in his life, such as marriage, financial situation, religion, his relationship with the Lord, or his work. Descending from a high place to a low place also indicates the presence of problems and obstacles to insight into something he wants to achieve (and God is Most High and Most Knowing). Interpretation of a traveler landing in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is descending from a high place to a low place, and the dreamer travels to a place, This is evidence that he will return from his travels to his home and relatives (and God knows best). Interpretation of lineage in general in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is descending from above, and the dreamer is a person in a high position and has influence, then this is evidence that the dreamer will face problems, lose his position, and be isolated from it. Whoever sees in his dream that he is descending from above and that the master of the dream is married and loves his wife very much, this is evidence of his wife’s illness and that she will die (and God knows best). Interpretation of falling in a dream for a sick person: Whoever sees in his dream that he is descending the stairs, and when he descends, he descends to a place he knows well. This dream conveys to the dreamer good news that God Almighty will heal him from his illness and that. God Almighty will compensate you (and God knows best). One of the scholars and interpreters of dreams said that falling by degrees, and each degree indicates the dreamer’s work in fasting and praying to God, and how close you are to God, Blessed and Most High. The dream of descending from a high place is a message from God, Blessed and Most High, to its owner, a vision of staying away from the unrighteous and the failed relationship that you want to destroy. (God knows). Interpretation of lineage in a dream for a married woman: Descent in a dream for a married woman indicates the family life of its owner, and the dream indicates the presence of some problems and consequences with her husband and she must be careful.

title: Distributing raw meat in a dream to single, married, pregnant and divorced women

preview.html: The interpretation of distributing meat in a dream varies from man to woman, and we will learn about this difference in detail in the following lines, so follow us to learn about the interpretation of the dream of distributing meat as charity. And distributing cooked meat in a dream, as well as seeing the vision of distributing cooked meat in a dream to unmarried women. And also the interpretation of distributing red meat in a dream from the website of the interpreter of dreams and visions. Interpretation of seeing raw meat distributed in a dream for a single girl. Distributing raw meat in a dream to unmarried women is evidence that the dreamer will fulfill her desires, and that her care will soon disappear and her distress will disappear, and this is due to the abundance of Her alms are given to the poor and needy. When he sees an unmarried woman in his dream, it is like distributing raw meat to the family and neighbors. It is a bad sign and symbolizes the many sins and gossip that God practices against those around her. We advise her to stop these others, because her sin is great before God. Distributing meat In a dream, whether raw or cooked. It is an indication that the dreamer is close to marriage, but this marriage will not succeed. She is suffering greatly because of her husband’s cruel nature and his poor guardianship. Cooking meat in an unmarried woman’s dream and distributing it to the family and relatives is a sign of hearing good news. If she gives some raw meat to her lover in a dream, this is a sign that their relationship will not last long, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing meat in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing raw meat distributed in a dream to a married woman. Giving raw meat in a dream to a married woman means seeing raw meat in general. In a dream. About the many problems and disagreements between the dreamer and her husband’s family. The distribution of raw meat is evidence of the many problems that she was exposed to by her husband and his family. The distribution of cooked meat in a married woman’s dream is evidence of goodness, happiness, and abundance of food. And whoever sees her husband giving her some raw meat in her dream A blessing and food for her home on the condition that she does not eat meat except by cooking it. If a woman sees in her dream that she is cooking meat, she will resolve her problems and disagreements with her husband. Cutting meat after it is cooked in a dream is a sign of raising children and raising them in the correct manner, and God knows best. Rotten meat in a woman’s dream For a married woman, it is a bad omen and portends a misfortune for someone in her family. Burning meat in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s illness and staying in bed for some time. Interpretation of seeing raw meat distributed in a man’s dream and its meaning. Distributing raw meat in a married man’s dream is evidence that the dreamer suffers from many worries and difficulties in life. His life. And if he sees in his dream that he is distributing cooked meat to his family, then one of his relatives may die, and God knows best. Seeing yourself distributing meat and distributing it to people in a dream means the end of work or partnership with someone. And whoever divides the meat and gives his wife some of it indicates his marriage. From another woman and he may divorce his partner, and God knows best. When a man sees in his dream that an unknown person is distributing meat, the dreamer may be exposed to a serious illness and need

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a whole man in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you an interpretation of seeing feet. The legs or feet are one of the most important elements of the human body, which many consider complete in a dream. So we brought it to all of you, dear followers. Legs in a dream related to knowing the interpretation in a dream, complete from the books of major scholars and the interpretation of dreams and visions. We also collected for you a vision in a dream of varicose veins and an interpretation to see hair on the legs of a completely naked woman in a dream and why bare legs dream of married women, as well as pregnant women and men. If you are interested in the interpretation of this dream, you should Read the article.Interpretation of seeing Ibn Sirin’s foot. The great scholar Ibn Sirin said that in most cases it is undesirable to see a whole leg in a dream and it is a sign of evil for the dreamer or for the person he loves. Seeing severed legs in a dream also indicates that the dreamer will lose a lot of money and property. Seeing the legs separated and rising to the sky is a great sign of adversity and disaster, and also indicates the death of the dreamer’s father or father. Ibn Sirin indicated in his book “Interpretation of Dreams” that seeing crooked legs in a dream means a serious illness and the end of life. Interpretation of seeing a woman’s unique legWhy? Dreaming of her leg in the dream of a lonely and strong woman, testifies to the dreamer’s strength in her religious world. But if a girl sees in a dream that her leg is completely broken, this indicates that undesirable things will happen and she will die. To dream of a man she likes is indicative of her inability to marry the person The one she loves.If an unmarried woman sees her legs twisted in a dream, this indicates her imminent marriage to a wealthy, righteous man.Interpretation of seeing a married woman’s legWhy dream of cutting off her leg is undesirable for a married woman in a dream shows her complete divorce from her husband.Seeing a married woman stained with blood in The dream is full of visions that indicate that she is unfaithful to her husband and that her affairs will be exposed. Seeing a woman’s entire left leg in a dream indicates kindness, good morals, and mutual love between her and her family. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s leg examination: Seeing a pregnant woman’s complete and beautiful leg in a dream means that she will give birth and improve her health. It proves her pregnancy. Also, seeing a pregnant woman’s severed leg in a dream is an unwanted vision and indicates problems and troubles during pregnancy and childbirth. Why dream of leg pain? Seeing pain in a dream was a sign of anxiety and sadness that surrounded the dreamer in his life. Seeing pain in full One's leg in a dream means that it has been healed, which means that everything that the dreamer is suffering from will be quickly eliminated. Seeing varicose veins in a dream Seeing varicose veins in a dream indicates that the dreamer is eating forbidden money, which indicates the dreamer's wrong and shameful actions. Why does a single woman dream of having hair? LegThe complete interpretation of seeing hair on a single woman’s legs in a dream indicates that she will soon achieve the goals and desires that she aspired to in life. Some scholars also said that dreaming of hair on a woman’s bare legs indicates diseases and problems that she is exposed to. Why do you dream of hair on a woman’s legs?

title: Interpretation of a dream about combing hair and losing lice in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about combing hair and falling lice in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. This dream is considered one of the dreams that carries positive interpretations and elements in its content, as among interpretation scholars. However, hearts tremble when they see lice falling in a dream, so many people seek to interpret his dream in a dream. Combing and falling lice in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and all interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream about combing hair and falling lice in a dream. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing hair combed in a dream is a praiseworthy dream that indicates the arrival of happiness, good news, joy and joy in the dreamer’s life. Gold or silver, and from here we explain the interpretation of a dream about combing and the falling of lice in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: A dream about combing hair with a silver comb is an indication of the multiplicity and renewal of intimate social relationships, whether a relationship of love or friendship. While you dream of combing your hair with a golden comb, it shows bright happy news. If the combed hair is In a long dream, it announces freedom from sorrows. If the hair is short, this indicates the discovery of some of life’s secrets. Also, the interpretation of a dream about combing tangled hair in a dream indicates this person’s distraction and his inability to persevere and be careful in his choices. As Ibn Sirin explains, combing Beard hair: It is an indicator of good character and a high level of the dreamer’s personality. While the beard generally indicates self-discipline. See also: I dreamed that my car was stolen.. Interpretation of the dream that my car was stolen in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about combing and falling lice in Nabulsi. The dream of combing and falling lice in a dream from Nabulsi carries many Of positive interpretations and indicators. Through the following we explain the interpretation of a dream about a hairstyle: Dreaming about combing hair in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s good morals with good qualities such as not abandoning the truth and following the approach and teachings of Islam. Interpretation of a dream about combing in a dream and falling lice in Nabulsi indicates the development of human capabilities in life. The process, acquiring new skills and getting what one wants. While if you see a dead person’s hair being combed, this is a sign of blessing and life. Read also: Interpretation of seeing sunflower seeds in a dream and the most important clues about them. Interpretation of a dream of combing and the fall of lice for unmarried women. A dream of combing hair and the fall of lice In a dream, a praiseworthy dream in a dream. Seeing a single girl with white lice in her hair in a dream shows that the unmarried girl is approaching her wedding date. She will be very happy to receive money or hear good news. Also, seeing black lice in an unmarried girl’s dream is an indication that Satan is controlling her thinking, causing her to fall into some Actions that God Almighty has forbidden. While if she sees in a dream a girl sick with lice, it is an indication that the unmarried woman will soon recover from the disease she is suffering from if the number of lice is small. If you see lice infecting the hair of an unmarried girl in a dream and it is severe, it is a sign of He will suffer a serious injury that you will not be able to handle. This leads to a difficult time in

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a gorilla in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a gorilla by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing a gorilla in a dream indicates the death of blessings from the dreamer. The dream of a gorilla indicates the presence of a fraud and a thief in the dreamer's life. If one sees in a dream that he is arguing with a gorilla and wins, this means that he will be exposed to an illness and will recover from it quickly. Seeing a fight with a gorilla and he wins you, this indicates a serious illness that afflicts the fortune teller. Interpretation of a dream of a gorilla by Nabulsi Buying a gorilla in a dream or receiving it from someone as a gift indicates fraud and deception that the viewer is exposed to by one of the people. Eating gorilla meat indicates the problems and concerns that the dreamer suffers from. A gorilla bite in a dream indicates a quarrel between the dreamer and his relatives. Seeing a dream of a gorilla for singles Seeing a gorilla in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates the presence of a deceitful young man in her life who deceives her with his feelings. The dream of a gorilla indicates the presence of a man in this girl's life who has no religion. Seeing a gorilla may also be an indication of her marriage to a man who may be the cause of her anxiety and sadness. Interpretation of seeing a married gorilla The dream of seeing a gorilla in a dream indicates Married to a deceitful and cunning man who will enter her life. Seeing a gorilla is a sign of losing blessings and lack of money. Seeing a gorilla indicates the problems that this woman faces. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant gorilla A gorilla in a pregnant woman's dream may indicate that she will give birth to a male child. Seeing a gorilla suggests pleasant events that she is going through and that childbirth may be easy and accessible. Seeing a gorilla for a man Seeing a large group of gorillas in a dream is evidence of the presence of a person in the dreamer's life who is full of many flaws, as well as the fears and problems that they cause. The gorilla announces the dream of the presence of an evil person in this man's life. The dream of a gorilla indicates the presence of an unjust person who infringes on the rights of others. Seeing a feeling of fear from a gorilla in a dream is a sign of the protection and security that the dreamer feels. Add the dream you want to interpret by referring to the social status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.
